author: Simon Difford
description: Grassy spirituous agricole rhum is mellowed by fruity pineapple, sweet herbal liqueur and vinous herbal vermouth.
name: First Emperor
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
